elements: The capacious but empty liquor cabinet

A luxury suite above the Palace of Auburn Hills arena

elements: The bed of an F-150 pickup, underwater
A dog-fighting ring behind a trailer park
The Mayor’s house on Plessy Street
categories.name: CHADWICK, IDAHO

elements: By a groupie, right the hell now
In a new and unsavory way not even Led Zeppelin attempted
By the one person who can refuse you
categories.name: TO GET FUCKED

elements: Because your promoter told you to get in the papers
To handle the pressure of a TV interview
categories.name: TO GET WASTED

elements: By ripping off the rest of the band
With the help of faith healer Tito Luna
By keeping the band together no matter what
With a sideline energy drink deal
categories.name: TO GET PILES OF CASH

elements: On these toolbags that call themselves artists
For the humiliation you endure every day
For ignoring your creative contributions forever
Because nobody calls you a poser
categories.name: TO GET REVENGE

elements: By showing the world that you have no limits
By winning an American Music Award
From the band, because you deserve ... respect
From the crew, who laugh behind your back
From your family, who think you are a failure
By bringing the light of Christ to the tour
categories.name: TO GET RESPECT

elements: Of certain promises you made to certain dangerous people
Of a debt you owe and can’t repay
Of your menial role, and thereby thrust into greatness
categories.name: TO GET OUT
